animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I'm the largest land animal.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food.
💧 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I live on a farm.
🌿 I eat grass.
🥛 My milk is very healthy.

animal.question: I meow and purr. I like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I have whiskers.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐟 I sometimes eat fish.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I'm the tallest mammal.
🌿 I eat leaves from tall trees
🌍 You can find me in Africa.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each individual.
🐎 I look similar to a horse.
🌿 I eat plants.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. I live in Australia. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am an Australian animal.
💪 I have strong legs for jumping.
🌿 I eat grass and plants

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🌊 I can change color to camouflage.
🧠 I am very smart.

animal.question: I have a shell on my back and move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am a reptile.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🏠 My shell is my home.

animal.question: I am a bird that cannot fly, and I love to swim in the cold. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I waddle when I walk.
🐟 I eat fish.
🧊 I live in Antarctica.

animal.question: I am known as the 'king of the jungle' and have a loud roar. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I'm a large cat.
🥩 I eat meat.
👑 The males have a mane.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I make something sweet that you eat.
🌼 I help flowers make seeds.
🐝 My name rhymes with 'bee'.

bug.question: I'm a tiny insect that hops and leaps, and some say I bring good luck to those I meet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am often green.
🐸 I can jump very high, like this animal.
🍀 Some people think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then spin a cocoon, and finally emerge with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am beautiful and fly around.
🐛 I eat leaves when I'm young.
✨ I go through a big change called metamorphosis.

bug.question: I march in lines and build big mounds. I'm known for being very strong for my size. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I work together with my friends.
🪨 I can carry things much bigger than me.
🧺 I often carry food back to my home.

bug.question: I light up the night sky with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I only shine at night.
💡 I use light to attract a friend.
🔥 My light is like a small fire.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and crawl slowly on the ground. Some people think I am good luck, especially if I have many spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often red with black spots.
🐞 People believe I bring good fortune.
🌱 Gardeners like me because I eat pests.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs, but I'm not an insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I'm known for my intricate traps.
🕷️ Arachnophobia is a fear of me.
✨ Some people think I'm scary, but I help control pests.

bug.question: I can walk on water without sinking. I am long and skinny and often found near ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I use the surface tension of water to move.
I am an arthropod but do not fly often.
⛸️ Imagine ice skating, but on water.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound and drink blood. I can leave you with an itchy bite. What am I?

hints.text: 🩸 Only the female of my kind bites.
🦟 I am a pest that thrives in warm climates.
🚫 People use sprays to try to keep me away.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, often resembling a leaf or twig to hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am really good at camouflage.
🌳 I blend in with plants to stay safe.
👀 You might mistake me for a part of the plant.
